title: Slackers – Carts of Glory
description:
Iron Meat When the drinks stop flowing and the city store’s closing its doors, who are you gonna call to save the day? Come roll with our crew of laid-back slackers, ready to turn chaos into glory, and possibly not into a disaster .
Race solo or with your friends in one of the most reckless downhill rides ever! Discover and master the unpredictable and unique movements of a shopping cart, find your shortcuts, collecting drinks along the way to satisfy your thirst and push yourself to crazy speeds across 16 different tracks to reach the store before it closes!

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 7770
